title: New: Shadowrunners Click – Cyberdine Mixtape
content:
If 2012 is know for one thing, and one thing alone, which frankly seems unreasonable, it’s likely to be remembered for some killer hip-hop.

Great news for music lovers, but slightly shittier news for artists desperately hustling for the attentions of bloggers and labels. LA natives Shadowrunners Click find themselves firmly lumped into the ‘overlooked’ category, despite a steady release of solid material leading up to their Mixtape’s release. Sitting neatly between the cloud rap of Cities Aviv and the wacky flows of Das Racist, it’s actually an increasingly pleasant distraction from a year of hip-hop that almost exclusively took itself too seriously.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
